name: Infinite Jigsaw
description:
This is a very early version of my jigsaw puzzle game made with Godot engine.

Puzzles can be sorted into trays (in the middle-bottom part of the screen).

Most graphics are to be changed (especially menu and UI) and more functionality to be added.

Game Controls:
Escape - Go back to main menu or quit game when in main menu
Left Click - Pick up or place puzzle down
Right Click - Rotate puzzle in hand
Mouse Wheel - Zoom camera
W/S/A/D - Move camera 
Tab - Show big puzzle preview
1/2/3/4/5 - Switch active puzzle tray
G - Toggle puzzle labels (shows puzzle index)
